mapper.sql: id, activity_id, m, start_date, end_date, sh_date, se_date, dy_date, de_date
mapper.insert:

id,
activity_id,
m,
start_date,

wh_status,

mapper.update:
update bg_activity_arg_info
activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
m = #{m,jdbcType=REAL},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sh_date = #{shDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
se_date = #{seDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dy_date = #{dyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
de_date = #{deDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ss_start_date = #{ssStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ss_end_date = #{ssEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ck_start_date = #{ckStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ck_end_date = #{ckEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ks_start_date = #{ksStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ks_end_date = #{ksEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ms_start_date = #{msStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ms_end_date = #{msEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
a_ks_users = #{aKsUsers,jdbcType=INTEGER},
b_ks_users = #{bKsUsers,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zkz_top = #{zkzTop,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zkz_content = #{zkzContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wh_status = #{whStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update bg_activity_arg_info set activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, m = #{m,jdbcType=REAL}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sh_date = #{shDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, se_date = #{seDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dy_date = #{dyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, de_date = #{deDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT baai.id as id,bai.id as activity_id,baai.m as m,baai.start_date as start_date,baai.end_date as end_date, baai.sh_date as sh_date,baai.se_date as se_date,baai.dy_date as dy_date,baai.de_date as de_date,baai.ss_start_date as ss_start_date, baai.ss_end_date as ss_end_date,baai.ck_start_date as ck_start_date,baai.ck_end_date as ck_end_date,baai.ks_start_date as ks_start_date, baai.ks_end_date as ks_end_date,baai.ms_start_date as ms_start_date,baai.ms_end_date as ms_end_date,baai.a_ks_users as a_ks_users,baai.b_ks_users as b_ks_users, baai.zkz_top as zkz_top,baai.zkz_content as zkz_content,baai.wh_status as wh_status,bai.pno as pno,bai.pname as pname FROM bg_activity_arg_info baai RIGHT JOIN bg_activity_info bai ON baai.activity_id = bai.id where 1 = 1
and bai.pno like "%"#{pno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
or bai.pname like "%"#{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"

SELECT baai.id as id,bai.id as activity_id,baai.m as m,baai.start_date as start_date,baai.end_date as end_date, baai.sh_date as sh_date,baai.se_date as se_date,baai.dy_date as dy_date,baai.de_date as de_date,baai.ss_start_date as ss_start_date, baai.ss_end_date as ss_end_date,baai.ck_start_date as ck_start_date,baai.ck_end_date as ck_end_date,baai.ks_start_date as ks_start_date, baai.ks_end_date as ks_end_date,baai.ms_start_date as ms_start_date,baai.ms_end_date as ms_end_date,baai.a_ks_users as a_ks_users,baai.b_ks_users as b_ks_users, baai.zkz_top as zkz_top,baai.zkz_content as zkz_content,baai.wh_status as wh_status,bai.pno as pno,bai.pname as pname FROM bg_activity_arg_info baai RIGHT JOIN bg_activity_info bai ON baai.activity_id = bai.id where 1 = 1
and bai.pno like CONCAT('%',#{pno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and bai.pname like CONCAT('%',#{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
